title: Venue artist scraper input
description: Scrape headliners and supporting acts from multiple venue calendars.

venues.title: Venues
venues.description: List of venue configs. Each one maps to a parser in main.js.

id.title: Venue ID
id.description: Internal ID (e.g. "mohawkAustin"). Must match a key in venueParsers.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Calendar or listing URL to crawl, e.g. "https://mohawkaustin.com/".

parserId.title: Parser ID (optional)
parserId.description: Optional override for the parser key. If omitted, main.js uses id.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: How many pages to crawl in parallel.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.
